	- maxAmount == _value (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f_BigbomTokenExtended.sol#478)

BigbomToken.totalSupply (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f_BigbomTokenExtended.sol#247) shadows:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f_BigbomTokenExtended.sol#53)

Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f_BigbomTokenExtended.sol#205-209) should emit an event for:

BigbomToken.setTokenSaleContract(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f_BigbomTokenExtended.sol#411-418) should emit an event for: 
	- tokenSaleContract = _tokenSaleContract (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f_BigbomTokenExtended.sol#417)

BigbomTokenExtended.airDrop(address[]) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f_BigbomTokenExtended.sol#538-547) has external calls inside a loop: amount = bigbomToken.balanceOf(recipients[i]) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f_BigbomTokenExtended.sol#540)
